column4: i have 8.04 server i'd like to upgrade to 12.04, should i do it with two updates (8.04 => 10.04 => 12.04) or one update (8.04 => 12.04) ?
I'd be very wary of doing that big an upgrade in one jump. I'm pretty sure it's not a supported option.
you think that's not even possible to upgrade from 8.04 to 12.04 ok i'll do it in two updates
